Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

1) Whenever I close the Firefox then after a few seconds if i try to reopen Firefox window then it doesn't open but shows a message like "Firefox is already running, but is not responding. To open a new window, you must first close existing Firefox process, or restart your system."

2) And it takes more time to open first time on every session.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Whenever it shows like this message I refresh it and then if I try to open then it opens.
2.
3.


Expected Results:  
I hope both the problems will be solved. I am expecting your reply to my e-mail id "hjshah_24@yahoo.com". Thank you.

comments.creator: xtc4uall@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
Is your Issue reproducible without Extensions in Safe-Mode and/or using a new Profile?
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Managing+profiles#Creating_a_profile

Does disabling of Security related Applications help?

comments.creator: creation1985@yahoo.com
comments.text:
Harshil have you tried the latest version of Firefox a.k.a 10.0.2? Do you still have issues ? 

Right now i`m running Windows XP SP2 under Vbox with Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:12.0a2) Gecko/20120307 Firefox/12.0a2 and i don`t experience issues with closing and/or starting Firefox.
